column2: "Hello there, are you on a mission as well?"
"It seems this vicinity has been recently designated as a restricted location. Carry out your objectives with caution."
"However, should you come across that rampaging dragon, Hadred, report and proceed to annihilate it immediately."
"In an area with heavy Darker activity like this, there's a possibility he might show himself."
"For whatever reason, he seems intent on destroying Darkers."
"It doesn't matter. He's a traitor, details like that are not my concern."
"Now if you'll excuse me, I'm going to continue searching."
